element.name: Tregolani Homebrew Collection
element.description:
This is a collection of personal homebrew created by Tregolani for DnD campaigns. Currently included in the collection are:

  • Items: Captain's Wright, Cursed Amulet of the Chameleon, Earrings of Alluring Charisma, Handwraps of the Flowing Soul, Land of the Dead Focus-Stone, Necklace of Inspired Wisdom, Quiver of Radiance, Sandals of Incredible Dexterity, Sentinel Shield +1, Silver Bell of Codgering, Surgeon's Tools, Tattooist's Tools, Trio of Throwing Knives
  • Feats: Elemental Blood, Healer (Improved), Titan Grip
  • Spells:
    • Cantrips: caustic strike, crusader strike, fountain blade, frost strike, heart strike, jolt, lance of faith, psi blade, rose blade, shockbolt, shock strike, storm strike, toxic strike, wind blade
    • 4th-level: crushing breaker
    • 5th-level: forked lightning
    • 6th-level: storm conduit
    • 9th-level: tempest barrage
  • Classes: Barbarian (Avarice), Sorcerer (Revised), Sorcerer (Wisdom)
  • Subclasses: College of Glamour (One-Dnd), Path of the Wildheart (Revised), Sea Sorcery (Revised), Tinkerer Physician (Artificer)
  • Races: Halfling (for Solandria), Half-Orc (for Solandria), Hexblood
